items.sentence: Tom did everything that he could to stop Mary.
We\'ll have to do whatever they tell us to do.
I\'ll go swimming with Tom tomorrow afternoon.
I\'ll go tell everybody what you just told me.
Do you listen to music while you\'re studying?
Don\'t let what happened to Tom happen to you.
Why don\'t we go out and get something to eat?
Tom didn\'t buy me what he promised he\'d buy.
Tom didn\'t do anything I wouldn\'t have done.
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have enough money.
